content:
From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
In PG, Isabelle -> Commands -> display draft should generate a pdf and
start a pdf viewer. Very handy.

Tobias

David Streader wrote:

From: Clemens Ballarin <ballarin@in.tum.de>
Alternatively, quick_and_dirty := true; in your ROOT.ML should do the
trick.

Clemens
